Comment: The response provides a comprehensive explanation of the theological concepts behind the phrase "God has called us by name," focusing on the personal relationship and divine purpose God has towards individuals. It effectively addresses the concern by delving into the intimate knowledge God has of each person and how He appoints them for His purpose. The response is well-supported with Biblical references and demonstrates a deep understanding of the personal relationship and intention God has towards individuals from a Christian worldview.
